findings.title: Admin/Owner Privileges can be misused
findings.description: The admin/owner of Aquagoat smart contract has various privileges over the smart contract, which can be misused intentionally or unintentionally.

findings.title: Incorrect parameters used in OwnershipTransferred event
findings.description: In the lock() function of Ownable smart contract, incorrect parameters are used in emitting the OwnershipTransferred event.

findings.title: lock() and unlock() functions can be called several times by the owner
findings.description: The lock() and unlock() functions in Aquagoat smart contract can still be called one after the other by the owner.
findings.location: Aquagoat smart contract, lock() and unlock() functions

findings.title: Spelling mistake in geUnlockTime() functionâ€™s name
findings.description: The geUnlockTime() function in Ownable smart contract has a spelling mistake.
